wikipedia_page.main: Roy Francis Adkins (4 October 1947 – 28 September 1990) was an English gangster. He was a recognised London gangland figure during the 1970s and 80s.

response: * October 4 – Roy Francis Adkins, English gangster and drug trafficker
* September 28 – English drug trafficker Roy Francis Adkins is shot dead in Amsterdam.
* September 28 – Roy Francis Adkins, English gangster and drug trafficker (42)
* Roy Francis Adkins (1947–1990), London gangland figure
* Roy Francis Adkins (42), English gangster from Hammersmith, London, who was murdered in Amsterdam on 28 September 1990 by unknown people after being shot.
